Name: ADHD / Starwars
Caption:
Her son with ADHD struggled with division in traditional math lessons.
Then, she incorporated his love for Star Wars:
"If we have 10 stormtroopers and need 2 armies, how many in each?"
Suddenly, math became exciting. He was solving complex problems with ease.
This is the power of personalized, interest-led learning.

Name: TREND: The Rise of Year-Round Homeschooling
TOOL: 5 Homeschooling Tools from Parent Ambassador Charlynn Chambers
